alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 9:27AM EST until January 10 at 7:32AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .Rainfall from last weekend and backwater from the Ohio river has caused flooding on the Green River. Water levels at Paradise will drop from moderate to minor flooding later today and then hold in minor flooding well into next week. The Green River at Calhoun will remain in minor flood stage through the weekend. For the Green River...including Paradise...moderate flooding is forecast, while at Calhoun minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 24.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
